languages.text:
The Overseer commands the Servoskull Swarm to move into the targeted cell. It spends {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} MP trying to reach it.
While redirecting, the Servoskull Swarm can pass through units and doesn't trigger attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer commands the Servoskull Swarm to move into the targeted cell. It spends {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} MP trying to reach it.
While redirecting, the Servoskull Swarm can pass through units and doesn't trigger attacks of opportunity.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} дает команду рою сервочерепов переместиться на расстояние до {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} клеток. Он может перемещаться сквозь занятые клетки и не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель дает команду рою сервочерепов переместиться на расстояние до {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} клеток. Он может перемещаться сквозь занятые клетки и не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

Надзиратель дает команду рою сервочерепов переместиться на расстояние до {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} клеток. Он может перемещаться сквозь занятые клетки и не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} befiehlt dem Servoschädel-Schwarm, sofort bis zu {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} Felder vorzurücken. Er kann dabei besetzte Felder passieren und löst keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher befiehlt dem Servoschädel-Schwarm, sofort bis zu {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} Felder vorzurücken. Er kann dabei besetzte Felder passieren und löst keine Gelegenheitsangriffe aus.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} ordonne à son essaim de servocrânes de se déplacer immédiatement sur un maximum de {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cases. Il peut traverser les cases occupées et ne déclenche pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant ordonne à son essaim de servocrânes de se déplacer immédiatement sur un maximum de {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cases. Il peut traverser les cases occupées et ne déclenche pas d'attaques d'opportunité.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}指挥自己的伺服头骨集群立刻前往目标格子处，距离不超过{uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0}格。伺服头骨集群可以穿过被占据的格子，且不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 监察官指挥自己的伺服头骨集群立刻前往目标格子处，距离不超过{uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0}格。伺服头骨集群可以穿过被占据的格子，且不会触发借机攻击。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} ordena a su enjambre de servocráneos que se mueva inmediatamente hasta {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} casillas. Puede pasar por casillas ocupadas y no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor ordena a su enjambre de servocráneos que se mueva inmediatamente hasta {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} casillas. Puede pasar por casillas ocupadas y no provoca ataques de oportunidad.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}は、{uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0}分のセルだけサーヴォスカル・スウォームを即座に移動させることができる。すでにキャラクターが存在するセルを通り抜けることができ、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こさない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督官は、{uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0}分のセルだけサーヴォスカル・スウォームを即座に移動させることができる。すでにキャラクターが存在するセルを通り抜けることができ、機会攻撃を引き起こさない。
監督官は、{uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0}分のセルだけサーヴォスカル・スウォームを即座に移動させることができる。すでにキャラクターが存在するセルを通り抜けることができ、機会攻撃を引き起こさない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, kendi hizmelet sürüsüne anında en fazla {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} kadar hücre ilerlemesi emrini verir. Yaratık, dolu hücrelerden geçebilir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} commands their servo-skull swarm to immediately move up to {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} cells. It can move through occupied cells and does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, kendi hizmelet sürüsüne anında en fazla {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} kadar hücre ilerlemesi emrini verir. Yaratık, dolu hücrelerden geçebilir ve fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, kendi hizmelet sürüsüne anında en fazla {uip|MP|57e2562dac5c40268e27f87317f008d0} kadar hücre ilerlemesi emrini verir. Yaratık, dolu hücrelerden geçebilir ve fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.
